verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:5
verses.text: And he ran unto Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou calledst me. And he said, I called not; lie down again. And he went and lay down.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:6
verses.text: And the Lord called yet again, Samuel. And Samuel arose and went to Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou didst call me. And he answered, I called not, my son; lie down again.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:7
verses.text: Now Samuel did not yet know the Lord, neither was the word of the Lord yet revealed unto him.
